title: Executive Order 5816-Power-Site Restoration No. 469, Montana
content: So much of Executive order of October 20, 1910, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 155, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 2 S., R. 20 E., sec. 32, lot 6.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5816-Power-Site Restoration No. 469, Montana Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361417
